sqlMap.sql:
WHERE STATUS IN ('Y','N')
TITLE LIKE #db_search_keyword#
HTML LIKE #db_search_keyword#
sqlMap.select:
/* HTML.getHtmlInfo */
SELECT FROM HTML_PAGE WHERE PAGE_SEQ = #page_seq# AND STATUS IN ('Y','N')
sqlMap.insert:
/* HTML.insertHtmlInfo */
INSERT INTO HTML_PAGE ( TITLE , HTML , STATUS , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE ) VALUES ( #title# , #html# , #status# , NOW() , NOW() )
sqlMap.update:
/* HTML.updateHtmlInfo */
UPDATE HTML_PAGE SET TITLE = #title# , HTML = #html# , STATUS = #status# , MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE PAGE_SEQ = #page_seq#

/* HTML.deleteHtmlInfo */
UPDATE HTML_PAGE SET STATUS = 'D' , MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE PAGE_SEQ = #page_seq#
